name: Marbledrome: Crazy Stunt Balls
description: Original game system, novel, fun and different from any game of racing balls. Compete against other players from around the world to get the best time on each track.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+ Processor: Intel Core2Quad Q6600 2,40 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 720 (2048 MB Ram) Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 245 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core I5-4440 3,10 GHz Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2048 MB Ram) Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 245 MB available space
